group_1.textRight: So this is the power of a Magical Girl...

group_1.narration: I couldn't stand to watch, helplessly,@while all those people suffered.
So I became a Magical Girl instead...
Long story short, I defeated@all of the Familiars in the area.
My wish freed all of those people and@returned them to the real world.
I don't know if it was a side effect of my@wish or what...
But not a single person the Witch captured@had any memory of what happened.
Which means that the girl's @disappearance was also forgotten.

group_1.textLeft: So does the fact that they think it never@happened count as saving them?
And now I'm really a Magical Girl...
Then the Witch kidnapping people@is also real, and she's still out there...

group_1.textRight: What you defeated were only Familiars.
The Witch that was controlling those people@with her Witch's Kiss is still out there.

group_1.textLeft: Oh.@So then, I guess I have to…
I guess I have to get rid of it, then!
That is what Magical Girls do,@right?

group_1.textRight: It's not just what they do. @It's their destiny.

group_1.narration: So now you know how I became a Magical Girl.
I know Witches are out there hurting@people.
I can hear my father's voice in my head:@"Inaction is cowardice."
This has never been truer than now...

group_1.textCenter: Geeze! @What on earth is she thinkin'?
